DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Collects authentication events from devices running Open SSH.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) (?:\w+\.info)? *(\w+) *(?:.+)? (sshd)\[\d+\]: Failed none for ((?:illegal|invalid) user)?\s*(\S+)? from (.+) port (\d+)\s*(.*)

FastPattern.description: 9, FailedAuthentication SSH Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.-]+) (sshd\S*)\[\d+\]: Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures for (\S*)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\S*\[\d+\]: Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures

FastPattern.description: 10, ServiceWarning SSH error: Bind to port
16, UserLogonFailure SSH error: PAM: Authentication failure
FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) ([-\w.]+) *(?:.+)? *(sshd)\[\d+\]: error: PAM: Authentication failure for ([\w. ]+) from (.+)

FastPattern.description: 17, RemoteConsoleAccess address mis-match: POSSIBLE BREAK-IN ATTEMPT!
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.-]+)(?: \S+:\S+)? (sshd)\[\d+\]: Address (\S+) maps to (\S+), but this does not map back to the address - (.+)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: .*, but this does not map back to the address - POSSIBLE BREAK-?IN ATTEMPT!

FastField.defaultValue: "$4" maps to "$5", but this does not map back to the address

FastPattern.description: 15, UserAuthAudit SSH: User not allowed because listed in DenyUsers
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.-]+)(?: \S+:\S+)? sshd\[(\d+)\]: User\s*(\S+)? from ([-\w.]+) not allowed because (.*)
FastPattern.pattern: User \S+ from [-\w.]+ not allowed because listed in DenyUsers

FastPattern.description: 18, ServiceWarning SSH error: ssh_msg_send, buffer_get_, key_
19, UserLogonFailure SSH error: PAM: User not known to the underlying authentication module
FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) ([\w.]+)(?:\s*.+)? (sshd)\[\d+\]: error: PAM: User not known to the underlying authentication module for *(\S*) user (.+) from (.+)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: error: PAM: User not known to the underlying authentication module

FastPattern.description: 20, pam_unix - drop these as they are caught in PAM
21, UserLogonFailure: fatal: Access denied for user
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) (\S+) (\S+)\[\d+\]: fatal: Access denied for user (\S+) by (.*)
FastPattern.pattern: \S+\[\d+\]: fatal: Access denied for user chittyme by PAM account configuration

FastPattern.description: 24, ServiceWarning: Did not receive identification string
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+]:.*?Did not receive identification string from [\w.:]+

FastPattern.description: 26, ServiceInfo: Received data for nonexistent channel
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: Disconnecting: Received data for nonexistent channel

FastPattern.description: 27, ServiceWarning SSH: PAM service ignoring max retries
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: PAM service\([^)]*\) ignoring max retries\;

FastPattern.description: 35, FailedAuthentication SSH Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures 2
FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) (\w+) (\S+) (sshd\S*)\[\d+\]: Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures for (\S*)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\S*\[\d+\]: Disconnecting: Too many authentication failures

FastPattern.description: 36, UserLogonFailure SSH error: PAM: Authentication failure 3
FastPattern.matcher: \<(\d+)\>(\w+)\<([\w.]+)\>: (sshd)\[\d+\]: error: PAM: Authentication failure for ([\w ]+) from (.+)

FastPattern.description: 43, UserModifyAttribute usermod change user from shell
45, ServiceInfo sshd found matching RSA key
46, ServiceInfo sshd found matching RSA key
49, ProcessInfo: sshd User child is on pid
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: User child is on pid \d+

FastPattern.description: 50, ProcessInfo: sshd User child is on pid
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: User child is on pid \d+

FastPattern.description: 57, ServiceInfo root TEST MESSAGE WITH FACILITY
FastPattern.pattern: root: TEST MESSAGE WITH FACILITY: \w+ AND LEVEL

FastPattern.description: 59, ServiceInfo root TEST MESSAGE WITH FACILITY
FastPattern.pattern: root: TEST MESSAGE WITH FACILITY: \w+ AND LEVEL

FastPattern.description: 60, ServiceInfo root TEST MESSAGE WITH FACILITY
FastPattern.pattern: root: TEST MESSAGE WITH FACILITY: \w+ AND LEVEL

FastPattern.description: 61, ServiceWarning sshd Read error from remote
FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) (?:\w+\.info)? *(\w.+) *(?:\S+)? sshd\[\d+\]: Read error from remote host ([\d.]+)(?::)? *Connection (.*)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: Read error from remote host [:\d.]+ Connection

FastField.defaultValue: Read error from remote host "$3" Connection $4

FastPattern.description: 62, ServiceWarning sshd Read error from remote
FastPattern.matcher: ([<>\d]+)(\w+)\S+ sshd\[\d+\]: Read error from remote host ([\d.]+) Connection (.*)
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: Read error from remote host [\d.]+ Connection

FastField.defaultValue: Read error from remote host "$3" Connection $4

FastPattern.description: 63, ServiceWarning sshd Address family not supported
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: socket: Address family not supported

FastPattern.description: 64, pam_unix - drop these as they are caught in PAM
65, ServiceWarning sshd Timeout, client not responding
70, ServiceWarning sshd logout returned an error
72, ServiceWarning Minor code may provide more information
FastPattern.pattern: sssd_be: GSSAPI Error: Unspecified GSS failure
useradd\[\d+\]: new user: name=([^,]+), UID=([^,]+), GID

FastPattern.description: 80, ServiceInfo userhelper running with root privileges
FastPattern.matcher: ([\w: ]+) (\w+) \S+ (userhelper)\[\d+\]: running '([^']+)' with root privileges on behalf of '([^']+)'.*
FastPattern.pattern: userhelper\[\d+\]: running '[^']+' with root privileges on behalf of '[^']+'

FastField.defaultValue: running "$4" with root privileges on behalf of "$5"
running "$4" with root privileges on behalf of "$5"

FastPattern.description: 81, ServiceInfo login Root login on tty
82, DeleteGroupMemeber user removed by root from group
FastPattern.pattern: gpasswd\[\d+\]: user \w+ removed by root from group
sshd\[\d+\]: Bad protocol version identification '[^']*' from [\d.]+

FastPattern.description: 88, NetworkSuspicious SSH: reverse mapping checking failed
92, UserAuthAudit SSH: User not allowed because not listed in AllowUsers
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.-]+)(?: \S+:\S+)? sshd\[(\d+)\]: User\s*(\S+)? from ([-\w.]+) not allowed because (.*)
FastPattern.pattern: User \S+ from [-\w.]+ not allowed because not listed in AllowUsers

FastPattern.description: 95, ServiceWarning SSH: Could not get shadow information
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\].*?error: Could not get shadow information for \S+

FastPattern.description: 97, ServiceWarning sshd: No such file or directory
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: lastlog_openseek: Couldn't stat [/\w]+: No such file or directory
sshd\[\d+\]: Authentication refused: bad ownership or modes for file [/\w.]+

FastPattern.description: 99, GroupAudit sshd: User not allowed because user's groups are not listed in AllowGroups
FastPattern.matcher: (\d+) ([\w.-]+)(?: \S+:\S+)? sshd\[(\d+)\]: User\s*(\S+)? from ([-\w.]+) not allowed because (.*)
FastPattern.pattern: User \S+ from [-\w.]+ not allowed because none of user's groups are listed in AllowGroups

FastPattern.description: 100, NetworkSuspicious SSH: reverse mapping checking failed 2

FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: User \S+ logged in via \S+ from [-\w.]+

FastPattern.description: 107, perl; pam_unix - drop these as they are caught in PAM
108, irrelevant data from openssh {webmin; rootkit hunter; incrond}
111, ServiceWarning Nasty PTR record; Read error from remote host
FastPattern.pattern: sshd\[\d+\]: (?:Nasty PTR record "[\d.]+"|Read error from remote host [\d.]+)
sshd\[\d+\]: The session allows \w+ connections only

FastPattern.description: 115, ServiceWarning open failed: administratively prohibited: open failed
FastPattern.pattern: open failed: administratively prohibited: open failed
sshd\[\d+\]: creating permissions file on behalf of
